text: Lauren Bacall (, born Betty Joan Perske; September 16, 1924 â€“ August 12, 2014) was an American actress and model. She was well known for her deep voice. She started acting in the 1940s. She acted until 2014. She had big roles in movies like The Big Sleep and Dark Passage. Bacall was the fourth wife of actor Humphrey Bogart. They were married until Bogart died in 1957. They had a son, Stephen (born 1949), and a daughter, Leslie (born 1952). Bacall married Jason Robards in 1961. They had one son, Sam (born 1961). They divorced in 1969. Bacall was once briefly engaged to singer Frank Sinatra. Bacall's cousin was Shimon Peres, the former Prime Minister and President of Israel. Their fathers were brothers. On August 12, 2014, Bacall died in New York City from a stroke, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Interview with Larry King on CNN * Article about the "origin" of the "Rat Pack" taken mainly from her book "Lauren Bacall, By Myself", (New York: Knopf, 1978) * Lauren Bacall Official website - at LaurenBacall.com Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from the Bronx Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish models Category:Models from the Bronx Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Lauren Bacall
